item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/01/2016 - Stuck in a Range? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/01/2016 - Stuck in a Range? - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price appears to be moving sideways between $620 and $680 while traders wait for larger market catalysts. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price appears to be moving sideways between $620 and $680 while traders wait for larger market catalysts. item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: Triangle Broken, Bitcoin to Test $800 Soon?
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: Triangle Broken, Bitcoin to Test $800 Soon?

Bitcoin price managed to break out of a triangle formation. The BTCUSD pair was trapped inside a flat that was formed since the price bottomed at the $555 mark. Although the price quickly recovered it was incapable of breaking the $700 resistance zone. Now bulls are trying to slowly overcome this hurdle.

item.title: Welcome to the new Blockchain Support Center
item.description:
Welcome to the new Blockchain Support Center

item.title: What exactly is a Bitcoin?
item.description:
What exactly is a Bitcoin?

An extremely complex software code. ****** *WHERE DO THEY COME FROM Bitcoins were designed by an unknown person, or persons, known as Satoshi Nakamoto in 2009. They're held in the Bitcoin network, from which they're extracted or mined by computers.
